name: shivam bajaj
text: Really good service. I mistakenly ordered a pizza with marinara sauce instead of garlic parmesan. I called them and they made suitable changes with no issues. I absolutely loved their pizza hut crust.

text: We go here every other week and they always do a great job!

text: Worst Pizza Hut service. I ordered a large Garlic buttery blend thin crust pizza and six traditional wings with Smokey Siracha. They made 1/2 inch layered cheese on pizza and no garlic crust.
